short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quran Tab is an Islamic new tab page that will keep you inspired by a verse from the Quran every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Quran Tab - Your Path to Spiritual Enlightenment

Discover the beauty and wisdom of the Quran every time you open a new tab with Quran Tab. Immerse yourself in timeless teachings to enrich your daily life.

Unlock the Power of the Quran:

1. Quran:
   - Explore the Quran easily with translations in over 40 languages.
   - Listen to the recitations of more than 15 renowned readers.
   - Leverage Quran audio repetition features for Quran memorization.
   - Save your favorite verses for quick access.
   - Let each new tab reveal a fresh Quranic verse to inspire you.
   - Get deeper insights with easy-to-understand explanations.

2. Azkar (Supplications):
   - Start and end your day with Morning and Evening Prayers.
   - Find comfort in supplications from the Quran.
   - Personalize your experience by adding your own prayers.

3. Prayer Times:
   - Never miss a prayer with accurate prayer times based on your location and one of 12 calculation methods.
   - Be reminded by the beautiful call to prayer (Azan) in one of 8 different voices.

4. General:
   - Customize your experience with a user-friendly interface. Easily turn features on or off according to your preferences.
   - Choose from 4 different languages for a seamless experience.
   - Enhance your browsing experience with stunning backgrounds.
   - Stay connected to both Islamic and Gregorian dates.
   - Choose your preferred time display format: 12-hour or 24-hour.
   - Stay updated with the latest additions through the 'What's New' section.

Credits to Open Source Projects:
  - Quran Text, and Tafseer: AlQuran Cloud - https://alquran.cloud/
  - Quran Audio: Islamic Network - https://islamic.network/
  - Quran Translation: The Noble Qur'an Encyclopedia - https://quranenc.com/en/home
  - Fonts: Google Fonts - https://fonts.google.com/
  - Design System: Chakra-UI - https://chakra-ui.com/
  - Icons: React Icons - https://react-icons.github.io/react-icons/
  - Backgrounds: Freepik - https://www.freepik.com/

Open a tab to enlightenment with Quran Tab. Download now and let the Quran enrich your digital journey.
